posts.title: Books To Help You Stick to Your New Year's Resolutions
posts.text: Have you already broken the promises you made to yourself on December 31st? These books can help you get back on track to meet your goals.

posts.title: Ho Ho Ho: Books to Laugh Your Way Through the Holidays
posts.text: A good laugh might be just the present you need this holiday season.

posts.title: Austim: Recommended Reading
posts.text: "As a father with a son with autism, I want to recommend these books for anyone wanting to learn more about autism and the experience of living with it."

posts.title: Books on Mindfulness and Meditation
posts.text: Have you lost your drive to do the things you love and that keep you active? There is an outlet that doesn't require much to keep your mind and body well maintained.
